summary: WE HAVE A 2000 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE.  THE BRAKES ARE PULSATING WHEN USED TO SLOW AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  THIS ISSUE IS WELL KNOW & RECOGNIZED BY THE MANUFACTURER AS A DESIGN PROBLEM.  THIS IS CREATING HAZARDOUS DRIVING BY MY WIFE & OTHERS WITH THIS VEHICLE.  THERE SHOULD BE A SAFETY RECALL BY THE MANUFACTURER.  THE ONLY WAY TO AVOID PROBLEMS IS TO REPLACE THE BRAKE COMPONENTS.   *NLM
